channel.title: Bread on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on Life Reboot

item.title: Cinnamon Scrolls
item.description: Sweet, doughnut like, cinnamon scrolls with a drizzle of cream cheese icing.

item.title: Easy Bagel
item.description: Simple bagels done right—it takes a bit of effort to make them the first time, but it’s easier every time thereafter. And the end result is so very worth the time.
